intro.heading: Proper Site Preparation for Driveways & Parking Lots
intro.content: Bellhouse Excavating provides expert grading and compaction services to prepare driveways and parking lots for paving, gravel installation, or resurfacing. We shape, level, and compact the surface to ensure long-term durability and proper drainage.
keypoints: Parking lot preparation for commercial sites

includes.heading: Driveway & Parking Lot Prep Includes
includes.subheading: Everything required to build a stable, long-lasting surface.

items.title: Grading & Slope Correction
items.description: We create proper drainage slopes to prevent pooling, erosion, and frost-heave issues.

items.title: Base Material Installation
items.description: Granular A or B placed, spread, and compacted in lifts for max stability.

items.title: Compaction
items.description: Using our diesel plate tamper (and roller rental if needed), we ensure proper compaction for long-term durability.

items.title: Driveway Widening
items.description: We remove sod, soil, and obstacles to widen existing driveways.

items.title: Parking Lot Prep
items.description: Commercial grading for asphalt or gravel lots of any size.

equipment.heading: Equipment Used
equipment.subheading: Reliable machines that deliver accurate grading and compaction.

items.title: Excavator
items.description: Used to remove old material, dig foundations, shape ditches, and establish proper grade.

items.title: Tri-Axle Dump Trucks
items.description: Used for hauling excavated material and delivering granular base and aggregates.

items.title: Skid Steer
items.description: Ideal for tight access areas, fine grading, material handling, and site cleanup.

items.title: Dozer
items.description: Used for bulk earthmoving, site preparation, rough grading, and large-scale material relocation.

items.title: Vibratory Roller
items.description: Provides consistent, even compaction for driveways, pads, and larger surface areas.

items.title: Diesel Plate Tamper
items.description: Used for targeted compaction in trenches, edges, and confined areas.

process.heading: How Our Process Works
process.subheading: A streamlined workflow for perfect surface prep.

steps.title: Site Assessment
steps.description: We evaluate drainage needs, slope issues, and required materials.

steps.title: Excavation & Removal
steps.description: We remove soft, unsuitable soils and shape the rough grade.

steps.title: Base Material Installation
steps.description: We place gravel in controlled lifts and compact between layers.

steps.title: Fine Grading & Slope Setting
steps.description: We dial in precise drainage slopes to avoid future issues.

steps.title: Final Compaction
steps.description: The surface is compacted and ready for paving or use.

serviceArea.heading: Service Area
serviceArea.content: Driveway and parking lot grading available across Brant County and neighbouring cities.

items.question: What base material do you recommend?
items.answer: Granular A for most residential projects, Granular B for deep fills or heavy traffic areas.

items.question: Do you prepare for asphalt paving?
items.answer: Yes, our grading and compaction meets paving contractor requirements.

items.question: Can you fix drainage issues?
items.answer: Yes, slope correction and ditching are part of our grading service.
